name: Calcuskate
description:
This is a demo of an Endless Runner game made for a school project. Play as Cool Johnny and skate across various math functions while tricking and grinding to increase your combo and score. Try not to fall.

Project is a work in progress, so things that are to be added in the future: 

  • Sound & Music
  • Level Mode
  • Bug Fixes
  • Polish & Game Feel

Feedback would be appreciated.
